pullrequest.title: Add sanitized MPL arm to repo

content.raw: Per @nkoenig's request, I added the meshes and copied the SDF from gazebo_models into the model directory instead of <include>-ing from gazebo_models. d2aeff6 Consider re-reviewing before merging. This PR no longer depends on gazebo_models #123.
content.html: Per @nkoenig's request, I added the meshes and copied the SDF from gazebo_models into the model directory instead of <include>-ing from gazebo_models. d2aeff6 Consider re-reviewing before merging. This PR no longer depends on gazebo_models #123.
